attributes.action: MAKE IT AN `OFFENCE` NOT TO REPORT AN ATTACK IN A PUBLIC PLACE
attributes.additional_details:
WE THE UNDERSIGNED WANT IT MADE AN `OFFENCE` NOT TO REPORT AN ATTACK IN A PUBLIC THAT THEY HAVE SEEN.

THIS IS HAPPENING MORE AND MORE THESE DAYS WHERE THE PUBLIC `TURN` A BLIND EYE TO GANGS ATTACKING ONE OR TWO PEOPLE, THESE PEOPLE ARE `COWARDS` WHO CARRY OUT THESE CRIMES AND AS SEEN IN THE MEDIA NOT WORRIED ABOUT HOW MANY PEOPLE HAVE SEEN THEM, WRONG AS IT WILL GET WORSE WITH TIME.

THE ONES WHO TURN A BLIND EYE MUST ALWAYS REMEMBER IT COULD BE THEM ONE DAY AND NOT VERY NICE TO THINK THE PUBLIC COULD SEE A MURDER IN FRONT OF THEM AND DO `NOTHING`, PEOPLE NEEDS TO BE MORE RESPONSIBLE AND `TELL` WHAT THEY SEE TO THE POLICE AND FORCED TO IN LAW AS BEING A GOOD MEMBER OR THE PUBLIC, THINK THAT IT COULD BE ONE OF YOUR RELATIONS BEING ATTACKED, NOT NICE IS IT, LETS GET SOMETHING DONE THEM.

MANY THANKS
